title: The Trail of the Serpent: Book 2, Chapter 4
description:
Phoebe reads a chapter a day of Mary Elizabeth Braddon’s The Trail of the Serpent. Read along.


Our other shows are Criminal and This is Love.


Donate to Phoebe Reads a Mystery.
